glsa.title: GraphicsMagick: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GraphicsMagick, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: GraphicsMagick is the Swiss army knife of image processing.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GraphicsMagick. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially-crafted image file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GraphicsMagick users should upgrade to the latest version:
